contentheadline.headline: List of authors by name: T

contentrichtext.text: [[List of authors]] by name: [[List of authors by name: A|A]] – [[List of authors by name: B|B]] – [[List of authors by name: C|C]] – [[List of authors by name: D|D]] – [[List of authors by name: E|E]] – [[List of authors by name: F|F]] – [[List of authors by name: G|G]] – [[List of authors by name: H|H]] – [[List of authors by name: I|I]] – [[List of authors by name: J|J]] – [[List of authors by name: K|K]] – [[List of authors by name: L|L]] – [[List of authors by name: M|M]] – [[List of authors by name: N|N]] – [[List of authors by name: O|O]] – [[List of authors by name: P|P]] – [[List of authors by name: Q|Q]] – [[List of authors by name: R|R]] – [[List of authors by name: S|S]] – '''T''' – [[List of authors by name: U|U]] – [[List of authors by name: V|V]] – [[List of authors by name: W|W]] – [[List of authors by name: X|X]] – [[List of authors by name: Y|Y]] – [[List of authors by name: Z|Z]] ==Ta== * [[Gladys Taber]] (1899–1980) * [[John Taine]] (1883–1960) ([[pseudonym]] of [[Eric Temple Bell]]) * [[Nassim Taleb|Nassim Nicholas Taleb]] (born 1960) * [[Amy Tan]] (born 1952) * [[Shelley Tanaka]] * [[Ahmet Hamdi Tanpinar]] * [[Jovica Tasevski-Eternijan]] (born 1976) * [[Wladyslaw Tatarkiewicz|Władysław Tatarkiewicz]] (1886–1980) * [[Ellalice Tate]] (1906–1993) (Pseudonym of Eleanor Burford Hibbert) * [[Alasdair and Hettie Tayler]] * [[Andrew Taylor (author)|Andrew Taylor]] (born 1951) * [[Janelle Taylor]] (born 1944) * [[Kristy Taylor]] ==Te–Th== * [[William Tenn]] (born 1920) (pseudonym of Philip Klass) * [[Steve Rasnic Tem]] (born 1950) (Steve Rasnic) * [[William F. Temple]] (1914–1989) * [[Daniel Terdiman]] (award-winning journalist, published in both print and non-print media) * [[Tom Terry (author)|Tom Terry]] (born 1963) * [[Walter Tevis]] (1928–1984) * [[Cathy Gillen Thacker]] * [[Dylan Thomas]] (1914–1953) * [[Jodi Thomas]] * [[Rosie Thomas (writer)|Rosie Thomas]] (born 1947) * [[Hunter S. Thompson]] (1937–2005) * [[Kate Thompson (author)]] (born 1956) * [[Kate Thompson (romantic novelist)]] (born 1959) * [[Kirstin Thompson]] (born 1950) * [[Vicki Lewis Thompson]] * [[Melanie Rae Thon]] (born 1957) * [[Henry David Thoreau]] (1817–1862) * [[Elizabeth Thornton]] (1940–2010) * [[Sylvia Thorpe]] (born 1926) (a pseudonym of June Sylvia Thimblethorpe) * [[James Thurber]] (1894–1961) * [[Robert Thurston]] ==Ti–To== * [[Patrick Tilley]] (born 1928) * [[James Tiptree, Jr]] (1915–1987) (pseudonym of [[Alice Sheldon]]) * [[Deborah Todd]] * [[Alvin Toffler]] (born 1928) * [[J. R. R. Tolkien]] (1892–1973) * [[Eckhart Tolle]] (born 1948) * [[Leo Tolstoy]] (1828–1910) * [[Yoshiyuki Tomino]] (born 1941) * [[Jean Toomer]] (1894–1967) * [[Akira Toriyama]] (born 1955) * [[Thomas Toughill]] ==Tr–Tu== * [[Pamela Travers]] (1899–1996) * [[Calvin Trillin]] (born 1935) * [[Anthony Trollope]] (1815–1882) * [[Sergio Troncoso]] (born 1961) * [[Leon Trotsky]] (1879–1940) * [[Antonio de Trueba]] (1821-1889) * [[Wilson Tucker]] (1914–2006) * [[Ilkka Tuomi]] (born 1958) * [[Ivan Turgenev]] (1818–1883) * [[Ethel Turner]] (1872–1958) * [[Harry Turtledove]] (born 1949) * Samuel "[[Mark Twain]]" Clemens (1835–1910) * [[Kathy Tyers]] (born 1952) {{inc-lit}} ==External links== * [http://www.ibookdb.net/authorlist/t List of authors by name: T] at [[The Internet Book Database]] [[Category:Lists of writers|T]]
